name: Workaholic (Chafe)
description:
Welcome in Workaholic !

A game for people who like to play (and they clearly don't want to work).

Your purpose is simple : play as long as you can, work as less as you can.

Your Boss is checking on you so be careful, if you are not working you risk to be fired !

Controls :

E : Work + UI Actions

Left button mouse : Play

Q/D : Change tab

The first tab is the "work" tab, you can work only on these one.



The team :

ChafeFlamme - Dev / Integration
PastisLaMalice - Art
Donut - 3D / 2D animation
Angraal - Art / Sound
Milefe - Dev

Thanks also SpartG for the help with unreal & the html5
